mapper.select: SELECT name FROM permission WHERE id IN ( SELECT pid FROM ( SELECT rp.rid,rp.pid,ru.uid FROM ( SELECT rid,pid FROM role LEFT JOIN role_permission ON role.id = role_permission.rid) rp LEFT JOIN (SELECT rid,uid FROM user LEFT JOIN user_role ON user.id = user_role.uid) ru ON rp.rid = ru.rid) u WHERE u.uid = (SELECT id from user WHERE user.username =#{username}))
